K14bsu015_u:2: evaṃ mayā śrutamekasamaye bhagavān śrāvastyāṃ viharati sma karīramaṇḍale ca /
K14bsu015_u:3: atha khalvāryāvalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nekavidyādharakoṭīniyutaśatasahastrastreṇa parivṛto yena bhagavāṃstenopasamakrāmat /
K14bsu015_u:4: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā bhagavantaṃ pradakṣiṇīkṛtyaekānte nyasīda bhagavantametadavocat /
K14bsu015_u:5: idaṃ mama bhagavannekādaśamukhaṃ nāma hṛdayamekādaśabhiḥ kalpakoṭībhirbhāṣitam /
K14bsu015_u:6: ahaṃ cettarhi bhāṣiṣyāmi sarvasattvānāmarthāya hitāya sukhāya sarvavyādhipraśamanāya
K14bsu015_u:10: sadevake loke samārake sabrahmake saśramaṇabrāhmaṇikāyāḥ prajāyā yadanena hṛdayena
K14bsu015_u:11: rakṣe kṛte paritre parigrahe śāntisvastyayane daṇḍaparihare śastraparihare viṣaprahāṇe
K14bsu015_u:12: kṛte yaḥ kaścidatikramet na praśamet nedaṃsthānaṃ vidyate sthāptya paurāṇāṃ karma vipacyate /
K14bsu015_u:13: tadasya ca kalpayato 'bhiśraddadhataḥ sarveṇa sarvaṃ na bhaviṣyati /
K14bsu015_u:15: smarāmyahaṃ bhagavan gaṅgānadīvālukāsamānāṃ kalpānāṃ pareṇa śatapadmanayanacūḍapratihataraṅgavelakiraṇarājasya nāma tathāgatasya /
K14bsu015_u:19: evaṃ bahukaro 'yaṃ hṛdayam tasmāttarhi śrāddhena kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā satkṛtyāyaṃ hṛdayaṃ sādhayitavyam /
K14bsu015_u:29: na viṣaṃ na garaṃ na jvaraṃ na śastraṃ kāye kramiṣyati /
K14bsu015_u:38: smarāmyahaṃ bhagavanniti daśānāṃ gaṅgānadīvālukāsamānāṃ kalpānāṃ tataḥ pareṇa paratareṇa mandāravagandho nāma tathāgato 'bhūt /
K14bsu015_u:41: eṣa ca mayā hṛdayaṃ pravartitvā sarvasmin karuṇāyanajñānagarbhabodhisattvavimokṣaṃ (Em 38)
K14bsu015_u:43: ye bandhanabaddhā ye badhyaprāptā ye udakāgnivividhaduḥkhābhyāhatāḥ tadanenāhaṃ sarvasattvānāṃ layanaṃ trāṇaṃ śaraṇaṃ parāyaṇaṃ bhavāmi /
K14bsu015_u:44: yat sarvaduṣṭayakṣarākṣasānāmanena hṛdayena karṣitvā maitracittān dayācittān kṛtvānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pratiṣṭhāpayāmi /
K14bsu015_u:46: ekavelāṃ prakāśitvā cattvāro mūlāpattayaḥ kṣayaṃ gacchanti pacānantaryāṇi karmāṇi niravayavaṃ tanvīkariṣyanti /
K14bsu015_u:50: sarvamanorathaṃ paripūrayiṣyāmi yaśca caturdaśīpaṃcadaśī māmuddiśya upavasati /
K14bsu015_u:52: tena nāmadheyamapi grahaṇena bhagavan saha so 'yaṃ buddhakoṭīniyutśatasahasrātirekasamam /
K14bsu015_u:59: sādhu sādhu kulaputra yat sarvasattvānāmantike evaṃrūpā mahākaruṇā /
K14bsu015_u:60: śakṣyasi tvaṃ kulaputraḥ anenopāyena sarvasattvānāmanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pratiṣṭhāpayitum /
K14bsu015_u:63: tataḥ khalvāryāvalokiteśvaro bodhisattva utthāyasanādekāṃsamuttarāsaṅga kṛtvā bhagavataścaraṇayoḥ praṇipatya idaṃ hṛdayamāvartayati sma /
K14bsu015_u:80: ime tile cile bhile khile svāhā /
K14bsu015_u:84: tadyathā ṭuru ṭuru hā hā hā hā svāhā /
K14bsu015_u:88: tadyathā thiri thiri dhiri dhiri svāhā /
K14bsu015_u:92: tadyathā sāde sāde sidi sidi sudu sudu svāhā /
K14bsu015_u:97: tadyathā yasi ddhasi cari huru icuruḥ suruḥ muruḥ svāhā /
K14bsu015_u:100: ragniṃ prajvālya dadhimadhudhṛtābhyaktānāmahorātrauṣikena ekena triṃśatā homaḥ kāryaḥ /
K14bsu015_u:102: namo ratnatrayāya nama āryāvalokiteśvarāya bodhisattvāya mahāsattvāya mahākāruṇikāya /
K14bsu015_u:103: tadyathā ili mili tili tili hili svāhā /
K14bsu015_u:107: tadyathā piṭi piṭi tiṭi tiṭi viṭi viṭi gaccha gaccha bhagavānāryāvalokiteśvara svabhavanaṃ svabhavanaṃ svāhā /
